casebody.data:
Theophilus S. Hill, sued as Adolphus Hill, d. b., a., vs. Samuel Ableman, p. b., r. Sussex County, April Term, 1895. Justice of the Peace.- -The transcript of the record filed for the purpose of an appeal must be under the hand and seal of the Justice. This was an appeal from a Justice of the Peace. The summons was issued to April Term, 1895, and an appearance was duly entered. Cullen, for the respondent,

moved that the appeal be dismissed upon the ground that the transcript of the record of the Justice had not his seal affixed thereto; 2 Harring. 160; 4 id. 47, 415; 5 id. 14; 1 Houst. 364.

The appeal was dismissed.
